archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Energie transporteren
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Het vermogen om energieaanbod en -afname bij elkaar te brengen, te balanceren en in continuÃ¯teit te waarborgen, zodat de klanten energie krijgen binnen de geldende eisen.

properties.value: The ability to bring together, balance and ensure continuity of energy supply and consumption, so that customers receive energy within the applicable requirements.
